title: Best of The Dan Patrick Show: 02/18/2021
itunes:title: Best of The Dan Patrick Show: 02/18/2021
description:
Doug Gottlieb and Rob Parker sit in for Dan Patrick and explain why the Pittsburgh Steelers need to move on from Ben Roethlisberger. The guys get in a fiery debate whether or not Jalen Johnson deserves to be criticized for quitting on his Duke teammates and speak with Padres reporter Dennis Lin about the organization’s decision to ink Fernando Tatis Jr. to a 14-year deal worth $340 million! Super Bowl champion Will Blackmon stops by to discuss whether or not Matthew Stafford needs to win a title with the Rams for the move to be considered a 'success.' Plus, Doug and Rob react live to breaking news that Carson Wentz has been traded from the Eagles to the Colts!

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.

Plus, Doug and Rob react live to breaking news that Carson Wentz has been traded from the Eagles to the Colts!
